recipes.title: Steamed Pork with Smoky Paprika Potatoes
recipes.description: A drink-friendly Brazilian dish featuring pork and potatoes with a smoky paprika twist.
steps: Prep ingredients: wash produce and diced aromatics.
Steamed the pork with salt, pepper, and smoky paprika profile until nearly cooked.
Cook the potatoes separately according to package directions; drain well.
Sauté vegetables in fat until tender-crisp.
Combine pork, vegetables, and potatoes; add sauce and simmer to coat.
Taste and adjust seasoning (salt, acid, heat).
Rest 3–5 minutes, garnish, and serve warm.
